00039 #include "rtt-typekit-config.h"
00040 // This include must be as soon as possible in order to avoid a gcc
00041 // compiler warning about visibility.
00042 #include "Types.inc"
00043 
00044 #include "RealTimeTypekit.hpp"
00045 #include "StdTypeInfo.hpp"
00046 #include "BoolTypeInfo.hpp"
00047 #include "../types/TypeInfoName.hpp"
00048 
00049 
00050 namespace RTT
00051 {
00052     namespace types {
00053         void loadOrocosTypes(TypeInfoRepository::shared_ptr ti);
00054         void loadStdTypes(TypeInfoRepository::shared_ptr ti);
00055     }
00056 
00057     using namespace std;
00058     using namespace detail;
00059 
00060     bool RealTimeTypekitPlugin::loadTypes()
00061     {
00062         TypeInfoRepository::shared_ptr ti = TypeInfoRepository::Instance();
00063 
00064         // The standard C types + std::string are defined here,
00065         ti->addType( new StdTypeInfo<int>("int") );
00066         ti->addType( new StdTypeInfo<unsigned int>("uint") );
00067         ti->addType( new StdTypeInfo<double>("double") );
00068         ti->addType( new StdTypeInfo<float>("float") );
00069         ti->addType( new StdTypeInfo<char>("char") );
00070         ti->addType( new BoolTypeInfo() );
00071         ti->addType( new TypeInfoName<void>("void"));
00072 
00073         // load the Orocos specific types:
00074         loadOrocosTypes( ti );
00075         loadStdTypes( ti );
00076         return true;
00077     }
00078 }
